alert.note: Alert for Kanabec; Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 2:49PM CDT until July 27 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... Central Mille Lacs County in east central Minnesota... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ogilvie, or 21 miles northwest of Cambridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mora around 300 PM CDT. Brunswick around 305 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grasston and Quamba. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
